org.treetank.api
Interface INode

All Known Subinterfaces:
INameNode, INode, IStructNode, IValNode
All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomicValue, AttributeNode, DeletedNode, DocumentRootNode, ElementNode, NameNodeDelegate, NamespaceNode, NodeDelegate, StructNodeDelegate, TextNode, ValNodeDelegate
public interface INode

Overall Node-Interface for the Interaction with the page layer. All persistence functionality must be handled over this interface while all nodeelayer interfaces interhit from this interface.

Author:
Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

Method Summary
 long getHash()
          Getting the persistent stored hash.

Method Detail

setNodeKey

void setNodeKey(long pNodeKey)
Sets unique node key.

Parameters:
pNodeKey - Unique key of item, maybe negative when atomics from the XPath-engine.

getNodeKey

long getNodeKey()
Gets unique node key.

Returns:
node key

setHash

void setHash(long pHash)
Setting the actual hash of the structure. The hash of one node should have the entire integrity of the related subtree.

Parameters:
pHash - hash to be set for this node

getHash

long getHash()
Getting the persistent stored hash.

Returns:
the hash of this node
